data.lyric:
[ti:Sweet Night]
[ar:뷔]
[al:이태원 클라쓰 OST Part.12]
[by:zhaoxin_karakal]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sweet Night - V (뷔)
[00:01.25]词：Hiss noise/V/ADORA/Melanie Joy Fontana/Michel “Lindgren” Schulz
[00:02.51]曲：Hiss noise/V/ADORA/Melanie Joy Fontana/Michel “Lindgren” Schulz
[00:03.77]On my pillow
[00:06.47]
[00:08.93]Can't get me tired
[00:11.99]
[00:13.76]Sharing my fragile truth
[00:17.53]
[00:19.06]That I still hope the door is open
[00:24.73]Cuz the window
[00:27.53]
[00:28.59]Opened one time with you and me
[00:34.21]
[00:34.73]Now my forever's falling down
[00:39.50]
[00:40.04]Wondering if you'd want me now
[00:45.33]How could I know
[00:49.38]One day I'd wake up feeling more
[00:54.64]But I had already reached the shore
[00:59.54]
[01:00.09]Guess we were ships in the night
[01:03.38]Night night
[01:05.69]
[01:20.66]We were ships in the night night night
[01:27.12]I'm wondering
[01:29.24]Are you my best friend
[01:30.80]Feel's like a river's rushing through my mind
[01:34.35]I wanna ask you
[01:36.56]If this is all just in my head
[01:39.33]My heart is pounding tonight
[01:43.88]I wonder
[01:46.00]
[01:48.09]If you
[01:52.98]Are too good to be true
[01:58.30]And would it be alright if I
[02:04.41]Pulled you closer
[02:09.09]How could I know
[02:12.51]One day I'd wake up feeling more
[02:17.97]But I had already reached the shore
[02:22.88]
[02:23.53]Guess we were ships in the night
[02:26.81]Night night
[02:29.68]
[02:44.38]We were ships in the night
[02:47.85]Night night
data.trans:
[ti:Sweet Night]
[ar:뷔]
[al:이태원 클라쓰 OST Part.12]
[by:zhaoxin_karakal]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.25]//
[00:02.51]//
[00:03.77]卧在枕畔
[00:06.47]
[00:08.93]不觉一丝倦意
[00:11.99]
[00:13.76]流露出脆弱真实的自我
[00:17.53]
[00:19.06]心里仍在祈盼一线希望
[00:24.73]毕竟你我之间的那扇窗
[00:27.53]
[00:28.59]曾悄然打开 
[00:34.21]
[00:34.73]此刻属于你我的未来渐渐黯淡
[00:39.50]
[00:40.04]也不知 你现在是否需要我
[00:45.33]我又怎猜得透呢
[00:49.38]总有一天 我会带着答案醒来吧
[00:54.64]可我早已迫不及待 抵达彼岸
[00:59.54]
[01:00.09]如果说我们是那夜幕里的小船
[01:03.38]那夜幕里
[01:05.69]
[01:20.66]如果说我们是那夜幕里的小船
[01:27.12]我想知道
[01:29.24]你是我的挚友吗
[01:30.80]我的思绪翻涌而来
[01:34.35]我忍不住想问你
[01:36.56]是否只是我的一厢情愿
[01:39.33]今夜我的心悸动不已
[01:43.88]我想知道
[01:46.00]
[01:48.09]如果你
[01:52.98]完美得难以置信 那般可望不可即
[01:58.30]倘若我试图靠近
[02:04.41]是否会冒犯到你
[02:09.09]我又怎猜得透呢
[02:12.51]总有一天 我会带着答案醒来吧
[02:17.97]可我早已迫不及待 抵达彼岸
[02:22.88]
[02:23.53]如果说我们是那夜幕里的小船
[02:26.81]那夜幕里
[02:29.68]
[02:44.38]如果说我们是那夜幕里的小船
[02:47.85]那夜幕里
